task.title: Resetting the Origin
task.shortdesc: For certain origin types, you can reset the origin when you want the to process all available data.

context.p: For certain origin types, when you stop a pipeline, the notes where it stopped processing data. When you restart the pipeline, it continues from where it left off by default, for those origins.
When you want the to process all available data instead of continuing from where it stopped, reset the origin.
You can reset the origin for the following origin types:

step.cmd: To reset the origin, from the pipeline canvas, click the Settings icon.
In the Reset Origin Confirmation dialog box, click Yes to reset the origin.
